Package sage.terrain

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ITerrain
    ITerrain defines the interface implemented by components of the Sage terrain system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractHeightMap
    AbstractHeightMap provides a base implementation of height data for terrain rendering.
    FaultFractalHeightMap
    FaultFractalHeightMap creates a heightmap based on the Fault Formation fractal generation algorithm based on Jason Shankel's paper from "Game Programming Gems".
    HillHeightMap
    HillHeightMap generates a height map based on the Hill Raising Algorithm.
    ImageBasedHeightMap
    ImageBasedHeightMap defines a height map which is created from the grayscale conversion of an image supplied to a constructor.
    MidPointHeightMap
    MidPointHeightMap creates a heightmap based on the Midpoint Displacement fractal generation algorithm based on Jason Shankel's paper from "Game Programming Gems".
    TerrainBlock
    TerrainBlock defines a single section of terrain.
    TerrainPage
    TerrainPage defines a quad tree of terrain components; each TerrainPage will have four children, either four TerrainPages or four TerrainBlocks.
